subject.normal: [Wine] Re: Building latest Wine-GIT on AMD64 still fails

headers.subject: [Wine] Re: Building latest Wine-GIT on AMD64 still fails
headers.received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=localhost.localdomain ident=list) by wine.codeweavers.com with esmtp (Exim 4.69) (envelope-from <wine-users-bounces@winehq.org>) id 1NkIrH-0006D8-4J; Wed, 24 Feb 2010 09:09:08 -0600

quote.quotepara:
checking whether ccache gcc -m32 works... no configure: error: Cannot build a 32-bit program, you need to install 32-bit
development libraries.

body.para:
This means you don't have gcc-32 installed (or whatever the package name for
it).

Wine is a 32-bit app and needs gcc that can create 32-bit binaries as well as
all required libraries. http://wiki.winehq.org/WineOn64bit
